title: Compression Anastomosis Using the CAR™ 27

operands.value: Patient is scheduled for a non-emergency procedure
Subject signs and dates a written informed consent form (ICF) and indicates an understanding of the study procedures
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Patient has an allergy to nickel
Patient has a diagnosis of bowel obstruction
Patient has a diagnosis of bowel strangulation
Patient has a diagnosis of peritonitis
Patient has a diagnosis of bowel perforation
Patient has a diagnosis of local or systemic infection
Patient has a diagnosis of ischemic bowel
Patient has a diagnosis of carcinomatosis
Patient has a diagnosis of extensively spread inflammatory bowel disease
Patient is participating in another clinical trial which may affect this study's outcomes
Patient has been taking regular steroid medication
Patient has contraindications to general anesthesia
Patient has evidence of extensive local disease in the pelvis

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Patient is over 18 years old'), Symbol('Patient is scheduled for a non-emergency procedure'), Symbol('Subject signs and dates a written informed consent form (ICF) and indicates an understanding of the study procedures'), Not(Or(Symbol('Patient has a diagnosis of bowel obstruction'), Symbol('Patient has a diagnosis of bowel perforation'), Symbol('Patient has a diagnosis of bowel strangulation'), Symbol('Patient has a diagnosis of carcinomatosis'), Symbol('Patient has a diagnosis of extensively spread inflammatory bowel disease'), Symbol('Patient has a diagnosis of ischemic bowel'), Symbol('Patient has a diagnosis of local or systemic infection'), Symbol('Patient has a diagnosis of peritonitis'), Symbol('Patient has an allergy to nickel'), Symbol('Patient has been taking regular steroid medication'), Symbol('Patient has contraindications to general anesthesia'), Symbol('Patient has evidence of extensive local disease in the pelvis'), Symbol('Patient has preexisting sphincter problems'), Symbol("Patient is participating in another clinical trial which may affect this study's outcomes"))))
